item.title: How to change the background for client
item.dc:creator: @im_a_beast im a beast
item.description:
@im_a_beast wrote:

ok just find a picture with the the exact image width and height “765 x 503” once u did that replace that with ur old picture and if the name is different then ur old one, replace the name of the pic by simply renaming it… if my instinct is correct ur going to need the same “type” of picture file… if u dont have it, simply try to find a tutorial of how to change the pic i recommend the “tutorial” section… sorry for not explaining it good, its just that this is not a proper TuT its a comment =P

Read full topic
